CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Tell us what you're looking for and we'll help you find it!
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Discover What Our Users Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Real experiences from real product enthusiasts
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized the way I discover new products. It's like having a personal shopper in my pocket!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've found so many unique items I never knew existed. It's addictive and incredibly useful!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a small business owner, this app helps me stay on top of trending products. It's been a game-changer for my store.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore a curated selection of innovative and cutting-edge products from around the world, handpicked just for you.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our smart algorithm learns your preferences to suggest products that match your unique style and interests.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Make informed decisions with honest feedback and ratings from our community of product enthusiasts.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Find the best deals effortlessly by comparing prices across multiple retailers and online marketplaces.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with instant notifications about emerging product trends and limited-time offers.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Create and share wishlists with friends and family, making gift-giving and product discovery a social experience.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app help me discover new products?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized feed of innovative and trending products across various categories, ensuring you're always up-to-date with the latest offerings in the market.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I save or bookmark products I'm interested in?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! You can easily save products you like to your favorites list for future reference. This feature allows you to keep track of items you're interested in and compare them later.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Are the product recommendations tailored to my interests?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, our app learns from your browsing habits, likes, and previous interactions to provide increasingly relevant product suggestions over time, making your discovery experience more personalized and enjoyable.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How often are new products added to the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We update our product database daily, ensuring that you have access to the newest and most innovative items as soon as they hit the market. Our team works tirelessly to bring you fresh discoveries every time you open the app.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Got questions? We've got answers. Find out more about our product discovery app below.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the app help me find new products?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app uses advanced algorithms and user preferences to curate a personalized selection of new and exciting products tailored to your interests and needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, the basic version of our app is free to download and use. We also offer a premium subscription with additional features for enhanced product discovery.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I purchase products directly through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While our app focuses on product discovery, we provide direct links to trusted retailers where you can make purchases securely.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How often are new products added to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We update our product database daily, ensuring you always have access to the latest and most innovative items across various categories.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I save or bookmark products for later?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Our app allows you to create wishlists, save favorite items, and set alerts for price drops or restocks on products you're interested in.
